title: Tiger's Quest
description: Back in Oregon, Kelsey tries to pick up the pieces of her life and push aside her feelings for Ren. But danger lurks around the corner, forcing her to return to India where she embarks on a second quest. This time with Ren's dark, bad-boy brother Kishan, who has also fallen prey to the Tiger's Curse.Fraught with danger, spellbinding dreams, ad choices of the heart, Tiger's Quest rings the trio one step closer to breaking the spell that binds them.
author: Colleen Houck
